GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.20 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
powerpc/spufs: Fix refcount leak in spufs_init_isolated_loader

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit d0cb99948c5f6d8fe56f6e69b8dd0a05ee5f9cec, it was introduced in version v2.6.20 by commit 0afacde3df4c9980f505d9afd7cb0058389732ca. For more details please see the references link.
